active_incidents.title: Degraded performance for less than 1% of users

notes.body: We believe service should be restored now and previously impacted users should no longer be experiencing issues with Slack. We're continuing the investigation and are working to put together a permanent fix. We'll follow up when that is in place.

We are currently investigating an issue where a small number of customers may have difficulty loading Slack, or experiencing degraded performance. We apologize for the trouble, and will let you know when we are out of the woods.
